Design Studio | Atelier Robin Architects

Project: Design Studio, Atelier Robin Architects
Location : Hazaribag, Dhaka
Interior Design: Salauddin Ahmed
Design Team: Ar. Osman Goni Shipon, Eng. Md. Al Mamun, Ar. Rezaun Rabbi Nahid, Ar. Md. Imran Parvej, Ar. Md. Shah Alam, Ar. Tahia Tabassum Trena, Ar. Abu Hena Mostofa Kamal, Ar. Umme Saimum Aalaa
Interns: Maisha Mehreen Khan, Mahibur Rahman, Farhan Labib Hossain, Mohoshina Islam Totiny, Nusrat Jahan Ridhon, Khondakar MD. Rajibul Islam Rabbi
Structural Engineer: Eng. Bengir Ahmed (Doric Design and Architect)
Project Engineer: Eng. Md. Al Mamun (Atelier Robin Architects)
Construction Firm: Atelier Robin Architects
Project Timeline: April 2023- October 2023
